text: is a pinball video game made by Jupiter and published by Nintendo for the Game Boy Color game console. It's a pinball game based on Pokémon Red and Blue, and like those games, it requires the player to find and capture all 150 Pokémon to fill the Pokédex. It's one of the only Game Boy games that uses rumble. In 2003, Nintendo released Pokémon Pinball: Ruby & Sapphire on the Game Boy Advance. Category:1999 video games Category:Game Boy Color-only games Category:Pinball video games Pinball
title: Pokémon Pinball
